title: Kingdom Hearts II -  [PS3] (PS2 classics) 4.21+
description:
Kingdom Hearts II converted into a ps2 classic for ps3.
The iso used was the pal version upon request. Although for my ntsc console I had to lower the screen resolution to 720p. Just through the settings on my ps3 to get the game to display for me.

Within contains the kingdom hearts 2 pkg file, the game's rap file within the exdata folder, reactpsn 2.26, and intructions.


To install.

If you already have a ps2 classics installed
and running on your ps3 then all you have to do is
install and play.

If you don't, here's how to install and get the custom pkg working.

1. Install kingdom hearts 2 and reactpsn.(Unless of course you already have reactpsn)

2. Place "exdata" folder on flash drive.

3. Put flash drive in the right usb port.

4. Create a new user and name it "aa".

5. Run reactpsn and do not press any buttons. (ps3 should do a soft reboot)

6. Play the game!
